title: WELCOME TO EDUNOVA
subTitle: Digital Online Academy: Your Path to Creative Excellence
description: The Eduna University Alumni Association is excited to announce the arrival of KU Alumni Connect. This is a new community building platform for Eduna’s alumni.It is the only place online where you can find, and connect with, all 90,000 Eduna’s alumni.

title: EDUNOVA’S MISSION
